idea:
The Company is engaged in Media & Entertainment Industry. It has developed two products: Plexigo & Cinean.


1) Plexigo: Plexigo is a first of its kind pay per view movie platform for Indian cinema and other content for a simultaneous release with theatrical release in India and international markets.


2) Cinean: Cinean is an intelligent service that suggests movies and online shows to its users. ​These smart recommendations are personalized and based on the users preferences.
name: PLEXIGO ENTERTAINMENT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
At Viotal Informatics Pvt Ltd strive to exceed your expectations by breaking barriers and
changing the game. We help you with or expertise services like BPO IT solutions, Hiring, Payroll Management ,
Background verification and Virtual Dispatch Services-USA.
Viotal Informatics is a one stop solutions provider and offer the experience and excellence in
service delivery. We help individual and organization to thrive their business across Pan India
and USA.
Viotal has a defined, wide strategy to source employees. Viotal does extensive testing and
background checking of any new applicants as per process requirements. We network within the
industry to recruit specific skill sets Candidates are hired based on their experience as well as
key competencies—communication and client industry knowledge.
With our inhouse background verification services we give our client ease of onboarding the
right candidate.
Our mission is to provide the highest degree of competent, accurate Services and solutions with
experience and expert staff.
name: VIOTAL INFORMATICS PRIVATE LIMITED
